Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no direct evidence or confirmation that the photo is indeed the first photo of the Ram temple being constructed in Ayodhya.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the photo, as it has been identified as a photo of the under-construction Kashi Vishwanath Temple in Varanasi, not the Ram temple in Ayodhya.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the construction of the Ram temple in Ayodhya has not yet begun, as confirmed by the official Twitter account of the Ram temple board.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo is of the Ram temple being constructed in Ayodhya without providing sufficient evidence or confirmation.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim may falter at times as it presents a misleading photo and misrepresents the actual construction site.
